mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOPPING_BASKET_PRODUCT ( PRD_NO, MEMBER_NO, QUANTITY, TOTAL_PRICE ) VALUES ( #{prdNo}, #{memberNo}, #{quantity}, #{totalPrice} )
mapper.select: SELECT s.MEMBER_NO, s.PRD_NO, p.NAME, p.PRICE, p.IMAGE, p.BRAND, s.QUANTITY FROM SHOPPING_BASKET_PRODUCT s JOIN PRODUCT p ON s.PRD_NO = p.PRD_NO WHERE s.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT PRD_NO, MEMBER_NO, QUANTITY, TOTAL_PRICE FROM SHOPPING_BASKET_PRODUCT WHERE PRD_NO = #{prdNo} AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SHOPPING_BASKET_PRODUCT WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT SP.PRD_NO AS PRD_NO, P.NAME AS NAME, P.IMAGE AS IMAGE, P.PRICE AS PRICE, P.BRAND AS BRAND, M.MEMBER_NO AS MEMBER_NO, SP.QUANTITY AS QUANTITY, SP.TOTAL_PRICE AS TOTAL_PRICE, S.PAYMENT AS PAYMENT FROM SHOPPING_BASKET_PRODUCT SP JOIN MEMBER M ON SP.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO JOIN PRODUCT P ON SP.PRD_NO = P.PRD_NO JOIN SHOPPING_BASKET S ON SP.MEMBER_NO = S.MEMBER_NO WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SHOPPING_BASKET_PRODUCT WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND PRD_NO = #{prdNo}
